My name is Nguyen Duy Tan Tan25 years old. I have two years of experience in software testing at DXC 
Technology Company. My work focuses on automated software testing, software performance testing, 
test planning and currently a software testing team leader.

Professional Work Experience 
02/2018 – 05/2019 
BRI LIFE INSURANCE / DXC Technology Vietnam 
Overview: This is a life insurance project working with Indonesian customers. In this project, I assumed 
the role of Test Leader. Main Responsibilities:  
2 
 Reference 
• 
Wrote test plans and test cases based on software requirements specifications. 
• 
Walkthrough requirement with tester team, analyze requirement assign task for team 
member. 
• 
Reported and tracked bugs, replicated reported customer bugs, verified bug fixes and new 
functionalities, regression tested new releases, supported developers by examining logs and 
debug files 
• 
Wrote SQL queries to validate data of scanned business documents, folders and images, set 
up data and retrieve data for tests. 
• 
Developed and executed performance test script scenarios based on the business 
requirements and specifications. 
• 
Analyzed the performance test results and provided recommendation to the performance 
tuning team. 
• 
Work closely with onshore team clarify requirement, analyze test result and report. 
06/2017 – 02/2018 
AVIVA INSURANCE / DXC Technology Vietnam 
Overview: This is a life insurance project working with Singapore customers. In this project, I assumed 
the role tester. Main Responsibilities: 
• 
Wrote Test Cases (Including Regression, Performance, Benchmark, Stress and Functionality 
Testing). 
• 
Performed system, functional, black box, user acceptance testing and regression testing. 
• 
Developed and executed performance test script scenarios based on the business 
requirements and specifications. 
02/2018 – 05/2019 
ITS AUTOMATION TEAM / DXC Technology Vietnam 
Overview: This is an automation test tool of domain Insurance in DXC Technology Vietnam. In this team 
I assumed member of team build framework. Main Responsibilities:  
• 
Improve ITS automation framework. 
• 
Led and mentored junior automation and manual QA engineers to execute and analyze 
automation smoke and regression tests. 
• 
Mentored and provided guidance for QA automation team member. 
• 
Organized and structure test case, test suite. 
• 
Training ITS automation test tool for QC, BA and Developer. 
• 
Presentation ITS automation test tool for Customer.
